amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike sections that extend probationary periods, modify suspension and termination procedures, or forced mandatory leave provisions.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 114-666 to strike sections that extend probationary periods, modifies suspension and termination procedures, forced mandatory leave provisions, and others.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 239 (Roll no. 373).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 239 (Roll no. 373).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Norton.
